about_the_game:
Introducing the Astra Protocol 2 - Audio Pack DLC

Dive deeper into the immersive universe of Astra Protocol 2 with our latest addition: a collection of six specially created ambient tracks to accompany you on your missions through space.

The Audio Pack DLC is completely optional, ensuring that you have full control over your gaming ambiance. Feel free to immerse yourself in the meticulously crafted melodies, or opt for your own soundtrack as you conquer the cosmos.

This DLC is available to all players absolutely free, as a token of appreciation for your continued support of Astra Protocol 2.

name: Astra Protocol 2 - Audio Pack
short_description: Explore the stars with this free collection of six audio tracks, specially created for Astra Protocol 2
